unnormalised: azchea digital yugant, cybersecurity mhunnllear fokot IT vibhagachi chintna uronk na; tem dondhnnit jivitant ek mhotvachem ang zalam, khas korun Bharata sarkhea tech-driven desant. smartphones, online banking, ani Paytm & PhonePe sarkhea digital payment platformsancher vaddoit vishvas dovrun, cybersecurity-achem mul'lik gyan dor eka Bharoti nagrika khatir poram'muk zata. cyberattacks vaddonk lagleat, ghotnank phishing scams-anchea nirdosh mon'xank dharun dhorl'lea ghottnanche sangata purnn sanghttonank nirdoll korpi sophisticated ransomware attacks porian asat. ho lekh cybersecurity essenshials-achem ek xikxonn divpi overview diunk sodhta, jem Bharoti sandrbhak lagun tailor kel'lem asa.
normalised: azchea digital yugaant, cyber security mhonnllear fokot I-T vibhagachi chintna nhoi; tem dorek disache jivitachem ek mhotvachem ang zalam, khas korun Bharota sarkea tech-chalit rasttrant. smart phone, online banking, ani Pay-T-M ani Phone-Pe sarkhea digital payment platformancher vaddttem avalambun aslean, cyber security-chi buniyadi vollokh dorek Bharoti nagrika khatir ut'tejonak pauvpa sarkhi asa. cyber survatek vadh zalea, jinnant phishing scam-achea gajranchem nirdos aslea veaktichero nirikshonn asta, ani ransomware-chea survatek sampurnn sanghatnak asahaya karta. hem lekh cyber security-chea buniyadi vollokhechea shaikshnik avlokhnancho hetu dharita, jo Bharoti sandarbhat dakhovla.

unnormalised: poileach panvdear, passwords-ancher dixa dium-ia. "123456" vo "password" khub vaitt cholnnukachem asa. dor ek online account-akhatir zodd ani nirall passwords vaprunk expert lok suchoitat. ek boro password kam'it kam'i 12 akxoram uzun astolo zayo, tantun upper ani lower case akxoram, ank, ani chihnam (zoxem, P@$$wOrd123!). hea complex credentials-ank surakxit dovrunk ani vevosthapit korunk password manager vaprunk vichar korat. Two-Factor Authentication (2FA) jem kiteak melltta tem xaky korun diiat; 2FA ek voirili suraksha zoddtta, tumchea phone vo email-antlean tumchea password-achea voirilean ek code magta.
normalised: poileach pauttim, password-acher ukta koruya. "ek don tin char panch so" vo "password" bhayanak nivodnuka asat. dhor eka online khatea khatir zor, anokhe password vapropak expert sulavtat. ek bore password kamit kamit bara aksharamchi asunk zai, zantun uchch ani kam akshar, ank, ani chihna (e.g., P at dollar dollar w Ord ek don tin vismayachihn!). hea jatil pramanpatrank surakshit sambhalpak ani niyantrit korpak password manager vapropak vichar korat. jithe sambhav asat, Thoddea-Gunak Manikrikonn (T-F-A) saksham korat; T-F-A surakshechi ek atirikta tabak vadh korta, password-chea atirikt tumchea phone vo email-antle ek code zai asta.

unnormalised: dusrean, phishing attempts-am vixim savd astolem. phishing ek sadharan taktik asa zo cybercriminals nagrikancho vishvas jikhun tankam usernames, passwords, ani credit card details sarkhi gupt mahiti ujvaddak haddunk vaportat. he attacks chodd korun emails, SMS messages, vo telefon calls-chea rupant yetat je jayaz disunk yetat. udahoronnak, tumkam "SBI"-koddlean tumchea account details-ank tharavo divpak vo "IRCTC"-koddlean ticket cancellation vixim ek email mellonk xakta. sodanch dhaddpeancho address barikayen pollounch, vyakaranachi chukam pollounch, ani sandeh asl'lea links-ancher click korunk addaunk. yad dovrat, jayaz sanghttonam khub unnea pavnddear emails vo SMS vorvim gupt mahiti magtat.
normalised: dusrea pauttim, phishing-achea prayatnache virodhant chuktolo zavat. cyber aparadhi veaktichea vaparti navao, password, ani credit card detale sarkhi mahiti ujddavpak vapurpak phishing ek samanya taktika zalea. him survatek email, S-M-S sandesh, vo even phone kallingant yeta ji kaydeshir dispak lagta. udahornak, tumi tumchea khatea detalechi pushtti korpak vo “I-R-C-T-C”-antlean ticket radhd zalyanchi mahiti ghevpak "S-B-I" antlean email mevtolo. sarpaneachok address soddat, vyakaranachyo chuka soddat, ani sandeh janak linkacher click korpak talat. yaad dovrat, kaydeshir sanghatna kaddchit email vo S-M-S-achea madhyamathle sanvedansheel mahiti magtolim.

unnormalised: tisrean, tumchea software-ak updated dovrat. software updates cybercriminals-ank ghait korpi suraksha patch-am-sovem yetat. tumchea operating system (Windows, macOS, Android), web browser (Chrome, Firefox), ani her software applications-akhatir automatic updates suru korat. updates-ank dhirlo korpak lagun tumchea devices-ancher malware infections ani her cyber dhomkiamchi bhirant asta. ek novea report-an dakholl kel'le, 60% safolya mell'lea cyberattacks-am voilea vulnerabilities-ancher ghait kortat zanka tem-te velean software updates-an addaunk zata aslem.
normalised: tisrea pauttim, tumche software updated dovrat. software update-ant suraksha patch vishvasghatancho samavesh asta je cyber aparadhi vapurta. tumchea operating system (Windows, mac-O-S, Android), web browser (Chrome, Firefox), ani her software application khatir automatic update saksham korat. update-ank udeer kortalean tumchi saadhan malware infection ani her cyber dhumkikulak dukhtaveli zata. ek naveen reportant dakhoile jinnant saat ekeka porimanache safal cyber survatek olkhichea vishvasghatank vapurta je velesarke software update-antlean tankunk shaktele.

unnormalised: chouthean, surakxit browsing cholnnuk-incho abhyas korat. avisvasty websites-amcher bhett divpak vo adnya nasl'lea sources-antlean files download korunk addaunk. tumchea computer ani mobile devices-ancher ek pratixthit antivirus program stapit korat ani tem updated dovrat. tumchem internet traffic encrypt korunk ani tumchea data-k eavesdropping-antlean rakunk public Wi-Fi networks-ak zoddtelea vellar virtual private network (VPN) vaprat. pop-up ads-am vixim savd ravat ani sandeh asl'lea links-ancher click korunk addaunk.
normalised: chouthea pauttim, surakshit browsing-achi adat kaddat. visvasnathi va web site-ak bhett diunk talat vo agyat strotantlean file download korunk talat. tumchea computer ani mobile saadhanancher ek pratishtit antivirus karyakram sthapit korat ani takai updated dovrat. tumchea internet yatayat-ank encrypt korpak ani kanfutti korpak tumchea datache rakhan kortana dhaklo Wi-Fi networkank zuddtana ek virtual private network (V-P-N) vaprat. pop-up jahiratanche babtint satark ravat ani sandeh janak linkacher click korpak talat.

unnormalised: ponchvean, tumchea social media presence-achi vollokh asat. cybercriminals tumchea social media profiles-antle mahiti-acho upeg targeted attacks suru korunk kortat. tumi ujvaddak dil'le mahiti-echi maryada ghalunk tumchea privacy settings-ank adjust korat. ajnani lokanchea friend requests-an vixim chintit ravat ani tumchea address, phone number, vo janmacho dis sarkhea gupt mahiti-echo post korunk addaunk. cyberstalking ek gambhir chintna asa, ani tumchea online vollokh-echo rakho korop mhotvachem.
normalised: panchvea pauttim, tumchea social media asti-ache babtint satark ravat. cyber aparadhi tumchea social media profile-antle mahiticho upyog nirdharit survatek suru korpak lagunk shaktele. tumi sarkarik rupak shere kartat tichi mahiti niyantrit korpak tumchi privacy setting adjust korat. agyat bhautik mittra-ank talat ani tumcho address, phone anko, vo zolm terekhe sarkhi mahiti post korpak talat. cyberstalking ek gambhir chinta zalea, ani tumchi online olokh rakhan korpak mahatvache zala.

unnormalised: xevottak, Information Technology Act, 2000-achea khala tumchea odhikarancho bhed gheat. ho act Bharotant cybercrime-achea poddid lokank kayeado vixim nirnay dita. tumchea odhikaranchem gyan gheat ani koslea-i cybercrime ghotnanchi suchna yogya odhikareank divat. cybercrime-achi tokrar sambhallunk desant khub cyber cells suru keleaat. tumi online cyber crime reporting portal (cybercrime.gov.in) vorvim ghotnanchem suchna diunk xakta. sogllem document korun dovrunk yad dovrat.
normalised: nimannea pauttim, mahiti tantrantrikta kaydo, don hazar antargat tumcheo hakki vollkhun gheta. ho kaydo Bharotant cyber aparadhachea piditank kaydeshir asti dita. tumchea hakki samarth korat ani cyber aparadhache ghatnak yogya adhikaryank riport korat. cyber aparadhache thukrancho dhyan divpak deshant cyber cell kaim sthapit keleat. tumi National Cyber Crime Reporting Portal (cybercrime dot gov dot in) madhyamantlean ghatnak online riport korunk shaktai. soglle dokument korpak yaad dovrat.

unnormalised: nirnnyant, cybersecurity ek cholta ravpi process asa zaka zagrutay ani vollokhachi goroz asa. hea essential tips-amchea pattlean vochun, tumi cybercrime-achea poddo zache tumchi bhirant mhonnun tumi tem khub unnem korunk xaktat ani tumchea digital assets-ank rakunk zata. xighraen bodolta astolea digital vastavtant, mahitichem ravonnem ani proactive ravonnem surakxit ani safe online experience sambhallunk mhotvachem. koslench online click, share, vo download korchea poilim sodanch don pavtti chintat, ani tumchea digital safety-ak fuddar divat.
normalised: akherik, cyber security ek chalu asti zalea zache khatir satarkata ani jagrukata zai. hea buniyadi sulavneo pavleank gheun, tumi cyber aparadhache pidit bannpak ani tumcho digital sampatt rakhan korpak tumchea jokhemank khub kam korunk shaktai. ek vadhpavpache digital dhoorpatant, surakshit ani surakshit online anubhav sambhallpak jagruk ravat ani purva-karmak asalear mukhya zala. online kainclick click, shere vo download korpak poilim don pauttim vichar korat, ani tumchea digital surakshek pahilo nimano divat.
